text.section: A person may not disclose any content of a grand jury proceeding.
A person who violates any provision of this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and, on conviction, subject to a fine not exceeding $1,000 or imprisonment not exceeding 1 year or both.

This section does not prevent:
A grand jury from submitting a report as required by law; or
Any other governmental unit or person making a disclosure authorized by law.
